content: What actor starred as Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe films?

The actor who portrayed Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) is Robert Downey Jr. He played this iconic role across multiple films, starting with "Iron Man" in 2008 and continuing through various Avengers movies and other MCU titles until "Avengers: Endgame" in 2019. His performance was widely acclaimed and helped establish the MCU as a major force in the film industry.
